    <facet>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Leča in približek tanke leče</string>
            <string language="en">Lens and approximation of a thin lens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Objektiv und Näherungswert eines dünnen 
Objektivs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Objectif et approximation d'un objectif mince</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lente e aproximação de uma lente fina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Obiettivo ed approssimazione di un obiettivo 
sottile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φακός και προσέγγιση ενός λεπτού φακού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lente y aproximación de una lente fina</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Na optično os dodajamo optične elemente (leče, zrcala, zaslonke) in svetlobnih virov ter opazujemo njihove vplive.</string>
            <string language="en">Optical elements (lens, mirror, shutter) and light sources are placed along the optical axis.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">optična os</string>
            <string language="en">optical axis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">optični element</string>
            <string language="en">optical element</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">svetlobni vir</string>
            <string language="en">light source</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">leča</string>
            <string language="en">lens</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Optische Elemente (Objektiv, Spiegel, 
Blendenverschluß) und Lichtquellen werden entlang die optische 
Mittellinie plaziert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Des éléments optiques (objectif, miroir, 
obturateur) et les sources lumineuses sont placés le long de l'axe 
optique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os elementos óticos (lente, espelho, obturador) 
e as fontes claras são colocados ao longo da linha central ótica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli elementi ottici (obiettivo, specchio, 
otturatore) e le fonti di luce sono disposti lungo l'asse ottico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα οπτικά στοιχεία (φακός, καθρέφτης, παραθυρόφυλλο) 
και οι πηγές φωτός τοποθετούνται κατά μήκος του οπτικού άξονα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los elementos ópticos (lente, espejo, obturador)
y las fuentes de luz se ponen a lo largo del eje óptico.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">optische Mittellinie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">optisches Element</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lichtquelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Objektiv</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">axe optique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">élément optique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">source lumineuse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">objectif</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">elemento ótico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
